messages: How about we explore a new hiking trail this weekend?
How about trying that new restaurant downtown for dinner tonight?
How about a movie night with some classic films and popcorn?
How about taking a spontaneous road trip to a nearby town?
How about joining a dance class to learn some new moves?
How about organizing a potluck dinner with friends this Saturday?
How about starting a book club for some intellectual discussions?
How about learning a new language together as a fun challenge?
How about a cozy night in with homemade pizza and board games?
How about taking a photography class to capture beautiful moments?
